name: Andaman Islands
description: The Andaman Islands are known for their white sandy beaches, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant marine life, perfect for snorkeling and diving.

name: Darjeeling Tea Gardens
description: Darjeeling is famous for its tea gardens, where you can witness breathtaking views of the Himalayas while sipping aromatic tea.

name: Gateway of India
description: The Gateway of India is an arch-monument built in the early twentieth century in the city of Mumbai, India.

name: Goa Beaches
description: Goa is known for its beautiful beaches stretching along the Arabian Sea, offering a vibrant nightlife and Portuguese heritage.

name: Golden Temple
description: The Golden Temple is a sacred Sikh gurdwara in Amritsar, Punjab, known for its stunning architecture and spiritual significance.

name: Jaipur Pink City
description: Jaipur, the Pink City, is famous for its historic forts, palaces, vibrant culture, and bustling markets.

name: Jaisalmer Fort
description: Jaisalmer Fort is one of the largest fully preserved fortified cities in the world, located in the heart of the Thar Desert.

name: Kerala Backwaters
description: Kerala's backwaters are a network of interconnected canals, rivers, lakes, and inlets, offering serene boat rides amidst lush greenery.

name: Taj Mahal
description: The Taj Mahal is an ivory-white marble mausoleum on the south bank of the Yamuna river in the Indian city of Agra.

name: Varanasi Ghats
description: Varanasi is a spiritual city on the banks of the River Ganges, famous for its ghats, temples, and religious ceremonies.
